page.title: 06DOWNLAND FARMS
page.content:
Half of the block is Downland, much of which is farmed. There are four working farms in the block. Saltdean Nursery is the only commercial garden centre in the area.
The farms are typical South Down farms with large fenced fields producing cereal crops of wheat and barley, and fodder crops of hay and rape. The arable fields are interspersed with large, unsown pasture lands, mainly for sheep, but also some for cattle and horses. At the eastern edge of the block at Telscombe Tye ,once one of the ancient sheep doens is an area of common land separating the modern housing development.
